subject: Keep getting Class Not Found
msgSnippet: Hello, I am new to JUnit.  I have made a simple class, lets call it MyClass.  Its located in MyClass.Java.  I have created a simple set of tests in a class
messageBody:
Hello, I am new to JUnit. I have made a simple class, lets call it
MyClass. Its located in MyClass.Java. I have created a simple set
of tests in a class MyClassTest in MyClassTest.java. MyClassTest
extends TestCase. The main method is:

public static void main(String args[])
{
junit.awtui.TestRunner.run(MyClassTest.class);
}

and it has a bunch of test methods

I compile it with:

javac MyClassTest.java MyClass.java

and run it with

java MyClassTest

The GUI lunches but displays Class not found "MyClassTest" at
bottom. I looked through the FAQ, and didn't find anything. What
am I doing wrong?

Thanks
